Upright dustpan design allows for quick and easy cleanup without the need to bend down
Durable crack-resistant polypropylene plastic and aluminum construction; firm plastic broom bristles effectively sweep dust and debris

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AmazonCommercial Lobby Dustpan with Broom Set

Ideal for Commercial Settings Effectively collect dirt with this sturdy upright dustpan and broom set, built for use in public, hospitality, and commercial settings. Durably Built Made to resist cracking or breakage with consistent use, the dustpan and broom are made of heavy-duty polypropylene and aluminum. Upright Design Allows debris to be swept into the dustpan making it a quick, easy solution for high-traffic areas. Easy Storage Simple to store in a maintenance closet when not in use, the lobby-style dustpan and broom feature a built-in hanging hole and space-saving design.

Does the dustpan stand up for storage, or does it need to be leaned on something or hung? The dustpan is designed to either stand upright for convenient floor storage or can be hung flat against a wall with the hanging hole at the top of the handle. Where can it be used? For indoor or outdoor use in high traffic commercial environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was bending down to sweep up another pile of dust and dirt in my garage for the 734th time this summer when I had a flashback to my childhood...Walking through the amusement park and seeing young girls in short shorts with brooms and dustpans on sticks walking around the park sweeping up cigarette butts and gum wrappers without bending over and damaging their delicate backs.Before the flashback faded, I jumped online and found not one but a four pack of these magical devices!One for the basementOne for the main floorOne for upstairsOne for the garageSome say that the brooms are a little bit short but I say they're perfect for one handed use unless you're 7 ft tall.I will never ever ever ever ever ever ever be without these again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the workshop
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for the workshop. I am constantly cleaning up after working on a project, and I am tired of the old flat dust pan that only holds a little, bends and breaks when I fill it up. I have gone through so many dust pans it is crazy.I found this one and had to give it a try. So easy to use, it holds a lot of waste/dust/dirt and whatever else lands on the floor. Just drop it down, give it a press and lock the handle in place. Now I can broom with two hands and fill the large dustpan up until it is full. I give it a press to unlock the handle, take it to the garbage can and easily dump it out. You can also leave it unlocked and go around with one hand on the dustpan and use the included little dust broom and pick up stuff all over, here and there. Great for outside cleaning up whatever doesn't belong there.This dustpan is easy to use, very convenient, sturdy and holds a lot. The 2 pack gives me a back which the wife already stole for the house. She loves it as well. This is a great value for the price and we both give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice combo dust pan and broom
reviews.reviewText: This is a very well priced set. Basically got 2 for the price of one. Dust pan is nice and handles easily. Brool is easy to use and they store as one unit The only negative about this set is that it does not include a rake on the dust pan to remove hair and other junk from the broom head. They have a little saw tooth edge on the dust pan but that's totally useless for removing dog hair out of the broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dustpan
reviews.reviewText: The broom is nothing special, has a pretty short handle, but I love the dust pan. It works great, no bending to use it and it locks in place to sit on it's own while you sweep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best quality that overpass recognized brands!
reviews.reviewText: This product is more than expected in quality and design not to mention the very affordable price; you get more than the value of your money. Easy to assamble and lightweight. We've been trying same style of dust pans of recognized brands, more expensive and we have returned them becuase of design disfunction.Definately a keeper! Higly Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not packed well for shipping. one of two arrived cracked
reviews.reviewText: These broom/dustpan sets seem to work fine. They are short, but that's the way they were supposed to be and it works for a quick sweep up. My only complaint is that one of the dustpans arrived with a piece broken out of the bottom (broken piece was in box). I taped the hole and I think it's still usable. I'm guessing I could have returned it, but wasn't really worth it if I could make it work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality brooms and are easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good broom
reviews.reviewText: It seems like great quality. I like the fact that the dust pan is solid, when a dustpan has rubber on the end it seems to always end up warping then its worthless. This one doesn't leave a dust line when you sweep into it. The broom is pretty short so I still have to keep a regular sized broom near if I want to do more than spot sweep. It's great if the kids want to help sweep. The bristles are pretty stiff which I did not like at first but honestly it is starting to grow on me. I noticed that the stiffer bristles actually pick up more dust and dirt than my regular broom.
De muy buen material, práctico y duradero! Lo compré desde Zacatecas, México y me llego en 6 días, 3 días antes de lo que me había declarado amazon
